title: SEC Wants $770 Million From Ripple — Lawyer Says SEC Is ‘Pissed and Embarrassed’
description: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) reportedly wants Ripple to pay a $770 million penalty for violating securities laws. Crypto lawyer John Deaton explained that the securities regulator is “pissed and embarrassed” after it lost several legal battles against the crypto firm. SEC Wants $770M From Ripple Crypto lawyer John Deaton detailed on social […]

title: How AI in Policing Reshapes Shoplifting Prevention
description: Key figures within the British government are boldly championing the use of AI in policing to combat crime, particularly focusing on the prevalent issue of shoplifting. As the world gears up for an AI summit hosted by Chancellor Rishi Sunak, concerns about the responsible use of AI have been underscored by the Finance Minister himself, ... Read more
